Title: Chasing Ghosts
Plot: Vic redirects his attention to finding out who really killed Lem after he learns for certain that Guardo wasn't involved. The Strike Team investigates the murder of a politician's daughter. Later, Cassidy confronts her father about his unethical past.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
